page.title: 11THE TOWN CRIER
page.content: They then had a bumper tea which was sticky buns and fruit juice. The May Queen celebrations used to take place on the Recreaction Ground,but they now take place within the school grounds. The May Queen is voted for,there is an average of 15 contestants each year.The fourth yaer pupils vote and the May Queen is chosen with the two runners up as attendants.On the big day the processional music is played and the May Queen walks to the throne with her attendants behide her and three pageboys walking in front.The Town Crier announces the crowning and she is presented with her crown and a small gift. There is always a play and country dancing which includes Maypole dancing and a staff dance. There is a six-a- side football competition which has 4
